law.catch_line: Sales by wholesaler to any other wholesaler.
law.text: When one (1) wholesaler sells cigarettes to any other wholesaler, the former shall not be required to include in his selling price to the latter, "cost to the wholesaler," as provided by KRS 365.270(11), but the latter wholesaler, upon resale to a retailer, shall be subject to the provisions of KRS 365.270(11).
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 5, effective May 18, 1956.
